translation.en: -50 milligrams of Versed now. -[Tessa] Jasmine, no! Don't, please!
translation.ja: テッサ ジャスミン やめて

translation.en: Tessa, if I let you go home, you won't make it through the night.
translation.ja: ジャスミン やめて 手術しないと危険なの

translation.en: You don't understand. You don't understand.
translation.ja: 行かせて 少し休むの

translation.en: -Get some rest now, honey. -I never got to tell… tell him.
translation.ja: まだ 彼に伝えてない…

translation.en: Tell him what?
That…
They can never, ever tear us apart.
translation.ja: 誰も僕たちを引き裂けない

translation.en: Tess?
[groans] Shan, is that you?
translation.ja: テッサ？ シャノンなの？

translation.en: Are you okay? You-- You sound medicated.
translation.ja: 大丈夫？ 投薬されたみたいな声

translation.en: -I'm at the hospital. -What happened?
translation.ja: 病院にいる 何で病院に？

translation.en: I saw him, Shan.
-No way. -At the hotel.
I couldn't touch him, but he was there.
translation.ja: 触れられなかったけどいた

translation.en: I just have one place left that I have to go.
translation.ja: あと１つ 行く場所が残ってる

translation.en: -The lake. -Where he told you he loved you.
translation.ja: 湖よ “愛してる”って 言われた所ね

translation.en: I just don't really have much time left.
Okay, stay put. I'm coming.
Whoa.
-Now what? -I don't know.
-Room 22. -I'll take him.
-[chiming] -Oh. Ooh, two more.
-[chiming continues] -Witching hour. I'll take odds, -you take evens. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 魔の時間ね 偶数の部屋をお願い

translation.en: -Whoa. -Let's go.
I could get used to this.
-Go, go, go. -Come on.
Oh, God.
[Shannon] Whoa. What the hell?
The lake is that way. You've gotta turn around.
translation.ja: 湖は逆方向よ　Ｕターンして

translation.en: -I know. I know! -It's the wrong way! Please turn around.
translation.ja: 湖は逆方向よ　Ｕターンして でも… 戻って

translation.en: I can't.
-Let go. -What?
Let go!
I want a dead boyfriend too.
translation.ja: 私も死んだカレがほしい

translation.en: What are you doing here?
Skylar says he's called you and left you a ton of messages.
translation.ja: スカイラーが 何度も電話したって

translation.en: -So? -So? You're ghosting your soul mate?
translation.ja: だから？ ソウルメートを 失っていいの？

translation.en: Shannon, my past is always just gonna get in the way.
translation.ja: 過去からは逃れられない

translation.en: Remember last year, you'd spotted that condemned bridge and just had to get a photo.
translation.ja: 廃橋の写真を撮った時のこと 覚えてる？

translation.en: You had to jump into the water,
translation.ja: 水の中に飛び込んだよね

translation.en: even though it was freezing cold.
You know what I was thinking when I saw you down there swimming against the current to get your photo?
translation.ja: 流れに逆らって泳ぐ あなたを見て こう思った

translation.en: "Imagine if Tess could be like this for her life, and not just for her art."
translation.ja: “写真だけでなく 人生でも こうあってほしい”

translation.en: He's leaving tonight, Tess.
translation.ja: スカイラーは今夜発つよ

translation.en: Lock up for me.
This is where the accident happened.
translation.ja: ここって事故現場よね

translation.en: Do you know why he brought you here?
No. I don't know.
But I'm gonna find out.
Tess?
Tess!
Oh, my God.
I need help!
[dispatcher] 911, what's your emergency?
[Shannon] My friend just passed out. She has a heart condition.
translation.ja: 友人が倒れた　心臓が悪いの

translation.en: I'm at the corner of 6th and Channel. Please send somebody!
translation.ja: チャンネル通りと ６番街の角よ　すぐ来て

translation.en: [Tessa] Skylar!
Tess.
You forgot your hat. [chuckles]
I'm so sorry, Sky.
I'm sorry. I'm…
[sighs] I should have talked to you before making any decisions.
translation.ja: 決める前に話すべきだった

translation.en: No. You shouldn't have to explain loving your family.
translation.ja: 家族が大事だって 説明する必要なんてない

translation.en: If I hadn't spent my whole life just pushing everyone away, I would have understood that.
translation.ja: 人を遠ざけてなければ 私にも理解できた

translation.en: -No, come on, Tess. -I love you.
I said it.
Would you mind if I said it again?
translation.ja: もう一度言ってもいい？

translation.en: I love you.
-[horn honking] -[Tessa screams]
-[Skylar] Hey. -[gasps]
-It's you. -It's me.
Oh, my God.
-I love you. -I know.
translation.ja: 愛してる 知ってる

translation.en: You told me. I love you.
translation.ja: 聞いたよ　僕も愛してる

translation.en: So that's why you brought me here?
So that I'd know?
Yeah. No regrets.
So, is this…
Is this it? We're still in Avalon.
translation.ja: まだアバロンにいるの？

translation.en: Not exactly. It's like everything you see is a memory,
translation.ja: そうじゃない これは君の記憶だ

translation.en: a dream that we have that's just projected onto the world.
translation.ja: 夢がここに 映し出されてる

translation.en: It's kinda cool.
Come on. I'll show you.
Okay.
[Shannon] Wait, wait.
translation.ja: 待って　大丈夫なの？

translation.en: [speaking French] Oh, my God. It's incredible!
Wait a minute! I'm speaking English, but it's coming out as French.
translation.ja: 〈待って フランス語を話してる〉

translation.en: [speaking French] Your pronunciation is not bad.
Can I tweak it a little?
Be my guest.
Aren't you forgetting something?
Can I really?
Try it.
I bet you wish you had your camera.
Not even for a second.
I came out here the first day I met you.
translation.ja: 初めて君に会った日 ここへ

translation.en: My parents had just told me about the separation.
translation.ja: 両親の別居を知らされた

translation.en: Felt like it was the worst day of my life.
translation.ja: 人生最悪の日だと思った

translation.en: And then I met you.
And it was probably the best day of my life.
Mine too.
[Dr. Sarkisian] There's nothing more we can do. She has a decision to make.
translation.ja: 手は尽くしました あとは本人が 生きることを選ばないと

translation.en: She has to want to live.
translation.ja: あとは本人が 生きることを選ばないと

translation.en: Come back, Tess. Come back, Tess…
translation.ja: テッサ 戻ってきて

translation.en: What's wrong?
I've spent my whole life learning how not to get hurt.
translation.ja: 私はずっと 傷つくことを避けてきた

translation.en: And that's no way to live.
But… But even with all the hurt that I feel right now…
translation.ja: 今 大きな痛みを 感じてるけど―

translation.en: I don't regret a thing.
Because I love you.
And knowing that I'm capable of feeling this way makes life worth living.
translation.ja: そう思えるのなら 生きる価値はある

translation.en: I don't want to say goodbye.
You don't have to.
Love never dies.
I'm gonna miss you.
[sobbing] I'm gonna miss you.
Go give us a happy ending, yeah?
translation.ja: ハッピーエンドを頼む

translation.en: Hey.
No more dying, okay?
Oh, my God. It smells so good.
-Sit down. There's plenty. -I can't. I gotta go.
translation.ja: 座って 行かなきゃ

translation.en: -Good luck, Tessa. -Love you.
translation.ja: 頑張って 愛してる

translation.en: -Go get 'em. -All right, bye.
translation.ja: しっかりな 分かった

translation.en: See you later!
[Tessa] Ever since I was a little girl,
people always told me that I see things that no one else does.
translation.ja: 人とは違う目を持ってると 言われました

translation.en: It wasn't just that my camera was a way for me to express myself.
translation.ja: カメラは 自己表現の手段だけじゃない

translation.en: It was the means by which I captured the unseen.
translation.ja: 目に見えないものを 捉える手段でもあるのです

translation.en: It was only recently that I discovered something that I had been blind to.
translation.ja: 見えなかったものに 最近やっと気づきました

translation.en: A ghost.
All of us, each and every one of us, are haunted by ghosts.
translation.ja: 私たちは皆 亡霊に取りつかれてる

translation.en: The ghosts of childhood trauma.
translation.ja: 幼少期のトラウマという亡霊

translation.en: The ghosts of unfulfilled dreams.
translation.ja: 見果てぬ夢という亡霊

translation.en: The ghosts of lost love.
Like so many people, I believed that
translation.ja: 多くの人と同様 こう信じていました

translation.en: if I just ignored these ghosts,
they would eventually go away.
This turned out to be a mistake.
Just like all of our worst fears,
these invisible spirits gain strength in darkness.
translation.ja: 亡霊は暗闇の中で 力を得るのです

translation.en: If we run from them, they run faster.
translation.ja: 逃げようとしても 逃げられない

translation.en: If we push them away, they just push back harder.
translation.ja: 押しのけても 強い力で押し返される

translation.en: What are we supposed to do?
It has taken…
great personal loss for me to discover the answer to this question.
translation.ja: 答えを見つけるのに 大きな喪失が伴いました

translation.en: We must attend to our ghosts.
We must welcome them into our lives
translation.ja: 自分の一部として 人生に迎え入れること

translation.en: as though they are part of us, because they are part of us.
translation.ja: 自分の一部として 人生に迎え入れること 私たちの一部なんです

translation.en: It's only when we acknowledge their presence will they make room for new possibilities.
translation.ja: 存在を認めることで 新しい可能性が生まれる

translation.en: In the end, I've learned that our ghosts are part of who we are,
translation.ja: つまり亡霊は― 自分と 自分の理想像の 一部なのです

translation.en: part of who we hope to be.
translation.ja: 自分と 自分の理想像の 一部なのです

translation.en: These hauntings stay inside us,
translation.ja: 亡霊は私たちの中に残り―

translation.en: tethered to our hearts forever.
translation.ja: 私たちの心に 永遠につながれる

translation.en: In life.
In death.
And… everywhere in-between.
translation.ja: そして境目の世界にも
